item.title: VCFB 2018 It was great...
item.description: VCF 2018 in Berlin was great! We’ve met interesting people there. Got a handshake withÂ Scot W. Stevenson who for(th)ced us to use his TaliForth2 ;) Later on Saturday Daniel Illgen - maintainer of the Adlib Tracker II for Linux - had decided to honor us with his OPL2 knowledge while on the way out. He advised us to keep the OPL2 sound chip on the Steckschwein, because the OPL2 chip is still not outbid.
